long_description: Merrell Luxe Wrap shoes feature great looks, slip-on convenience and all-day support and comfort to ensure you and your feet keep going throughout the day. Premium oiled nubuck leather uppers offer refined style and lasting wear. Supple pigskin leather linings and topsoles provide glovelike comfort and breathable performance. Dual-density polyurethane midsoles and Air Cushion heel pods absorb shock and cushion feet. Molded nylon arch shanks supply stability and support for all-day wear. Rubber outsoles on the Merrell Luxe Wrap shoes deliver good all-around traction. The Merrell Luxe Wrap shoes proudly carry the Seal of Acceptance from the American Podiatric Medical Association.
short_description: Merrell Luxe Wrap shoes feature great looks, slip-on convenience and all-day support and comfort to ensure you and your feet keep going throughout the day.
